item.title: Dataplatform for IoT
item.description: Challenge With the vision for instrumenting physical world, I was tasked with building a platform that enabled rapid prototyping & installation of sensors. Solution I built a data platform that provided an APIs & framework for: Defining sensor schema Collecting sensor data. The data was stored as timeseries in HBase. Stream collected data in realtime for visualization and installation validation. Perform real time and batch analytics on collected data using Spark.
